title: itis1MM
author: itis1MM
created_time: April 27, 2023, 01:52:56 PMLast edit: April 29, 2023, 11:56:55 AM by itis1MM
content: Hello,I'm looking for this provider/seller. At 50 BTC minimum.Fiat (cash) will be deposited into escrow, while your BTC will be deposited into escrow.The escrow firm can be your choice, to be reviewed. Otherwise, we can use my escrow.We can discuss.Thanksedit: updated

comments.author: SMB
comments.body: If this is legal you dont need this platform.Nobody here has 50K BTC

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: itis1MM on April 27, 2023, 01:52:56 PMI'm looking for this provider/seller. At 50 BTC minimum.Fiat (cash) will be deposited into escrow, while your BTC will be deposited into escrow.The amount of 50 bitcoins is about a million and a half dollars, and if you want this amount as cash, it will look like this[1].I do not think that any sane person would try to do such a deal in a public place, and therefore you will not find anyone willing to do such a transaction with you here.You have two options: - Either you go to OTC markets[2][3][4], which are highly regulated markets, with prices starting from one million dollars. - Wait for government auctions where sized coins are sold.[1] https://propmoney.info/prop-currency-dimensions.html[2] https://www.coinbase.com/blog/announcing-new-features-and-services-to-make-trading-easier-for-high-volume-customers-in-asia-and[3] https://www.kraken.com/features/otc-exchange[4] https://www.binance.com/en/OTC-Trading

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Quote from: itis1MM on April 27, 2023, 01:52:56 PMHello,I'm looking for this provider/seller. At 50 BTC minimum.Fiat (cash) will be deposited into escrow, while your BTC will be deposited into escrow.The escrow firm can be your choice, to be reviewed. Otherwise, we can use my escrow.We can discuss.Thanksedit: updatedAre you from the past? Who needs that huge physical cash this day when the global financial statement has gone digitalised, which is more secure and privacy oriented? Carrying cash around is something anyone will want to carry about,  that amount is cash will need a mini Vulione van to covey to the point of the deal.

comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: Quote from: larry_vw_1955 on April 30, 2023, 03:00:39 AMall the scammers hustling to set up their own fake escrow service... OP mentioned about reviewing escrow service, it's not really a concern, as long as both agree, it's a small issue, the problem is the amount that needs to be transacted Quote from: itis1MM on April 27, 2023, 01:52:56 PMFiat (cash) will be deposited into escrow, while your BTC will be deposited into escrow.It is possibly one of the craziest things I've seen since i started seeing this forum   Are you confused? if it's an intermediary escrow service, maybe we can do online transactions instead of cash like you said? just a little concern, the amount is too big for me to interfere, keep an eye here and see what OP does next, really curious

comments.author: jcojci
comments.body: We are talking about big money. How do we ensure that you will not deceive us or the people who will transact with you, even if there is an escrow agent who will help?We also don't know where the money came from because after the fiat money is transferred to our account, the bank will definitely track it and if the bank finds something strange is going on, the bank will ask us about it. That's where we can get into trouble because we've never met and don't know each other.Maybe you can buy BTC on the black market, where some are buying and selling BTC

Most likely.Quote from: ChuckBuck on April 30, 2023, 03:42:57 AMIt is possibly one of the craziest things I've seen since i started seeing this forum   Does anyone know an escrow who escrows mountains of fiat banknotes? LMAO.

Consignment by simple forwarding, maybe it takes a few months if traveling by water?    sorry if i got off topic

comments.author: namaidani
comments.body: I recommend Pay NaMaidani - pay.namaidani.com. You will need time to fund your account to buy cryptocurrency. There is a limit of 100,000 per exchange transaction, then multiple transactions are required. You can exchange online in seconds. You will need more time to replenish the balance in the network.
